name: Die To Win
description:
There is no way to clear any level without dying bravely first! However, this is not a game about death or dying. On the contrary, it's all about surviving and winning. Just that sometimes you need to die to live and die to win!

Die to Win tells a story of monster learning and trying to die as little as possible in order to go through as many levels of challenge as it can within 500 seconds for the success of a higher score!
